item.title: CVE-2022-22793|2024-09-16T16:52:49.532Z -- cybonet -- pineapp%20mail%20relay
item.description: Cybonet - PineApp Mail Relay Local File Inclusion. Attacker can send a request to : /manage/mailpolicymtm/log/eml_viewer/email.content.body.php?filesystem_path=ENCDODED PATH and by doing that, the attacker can read Local Files inside the server.
